venue-accommodation-contact:
To book accommodation contact the organizers on: info@bachatakizomba.com or on Facebook:
Nataly Hristolubova, Irina Jakobovica

venue-accommodation-1-description: Room for 3-4 people 13,-EUR/ per person/per night, no breakfast, WC and shower room in the corridor, kitchen available.

venue-accommodation-2-description:
Distance from the venue 1,9 km (taxi will be available for a fixed price to/from the venue).
Double room 40,- EUR/1 night, incl. breakfast
Twin room 40,- EUR/1 night, incl. breakfast.

venue-accommodation-3-description: Distance from the venue 1 km. Double room 75,- EUR /1 night, incl. breakfast Triple room 95,- EUR/ 1 night, incl. Breakfast.

venue-accommodation-4-description:
Distance from the venue 1,5 km (taxi will be available for a fixed price to/from the venue).
BOOKING ONLY AVAILABLE FROM MAY 3-5
Double room 45,- EUR/1 night, incl. breakfast
Single 40,- EUR/1 night, incl. breakfast.
